thread.title: Big Kahuna’s Island Style Bowls coming to Winter Springs
thread.title_full: Big Kahuna’s Island Style Bowls coming to Winter Springs

author: Lauren Delgado
title: Big Kahuna’s Island Style Bowls coming to Winter Springs
text:
Entertainment Restaurants Orlando Sentinel Foodie | Orlando Restaurants Big Kahuna’s Island Style Bowls coming to Winter Springs Lauren Delgado will be opening in the Willa Springs Plaza - 1450 Tuskawilla Road, Suite 108, in Winter Springs. The restaurant will be open daily from 10:30 a.m.-9 p.m.
It will serve Hawaiian-inspired poke bowls featuring ahi tuna, salmon, yellowtail, and more seafood, which will be layered with white or brown rice, the diner’s choice of seven sauces, and toppings such as seaweed salad, cucumber, edamame, mango, pickled vegetables, daikon and wasabi peas. 
Build your own bowls as well as suggested mixes start at $10. A vegetable poke with ponzu sauce, edamame, corn, avocado, cucumber and jalapeno is available for $8. 
The restaurant concept comes from Paul Reas and Mark Setterington, of Bahama Breeze and The Kreative Kitchen, respectively. 
The fast-casual poke bowl restaurant will also serve Dole Whip dessert bowls starting at $4. 
Keep an eye on the restaurant’s Facebook page at facebook.com/BigKahunaBowls for more information on a grand opening date and time. Caption Local beer brewery talks about distribution
